How long should it take to restart?  I used the program and took care to only download and install the drivers.  The machine needed to reset to finish installing.  It tries restarting, but stays stuck on the Windows screen.  I tried three times... first time 15 minutes and then I manually restarted... let it go for 45 minutes... restarted again... then left it for an hour and a half and finally I just restarted from a restore point and have been fine.  When trying to restart it would stay on the black screen with the windows logo glowing.  I do not think my machine was "stuck"... you could tell the logo was glowing and moving.  The OS would just never load. 

Is it supposed to take this long?  Anyone have any suggestions?
